channel.title: Comics on Sebiwi
channel.description: Recent content in Comics on Sebiwi

item.title: You are not your code
item.description: ![You are not your code. This code looks like it’s been written by an imbecil. That remark is about your code, not about you.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: DST
item.description: ![DST makes my head spin and I often wonder about the reasons we’re still using it. It must be hard to tell people that all of their suffering was for nothing.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: ext5
item.description: ![ext5 will be directly integrated into systemd.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: KPI
item.description: ![If you want to generate some bugs, always remember to fix your deadline.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Libra
item.description: ![If I wanted my financial transaction information to be used for political advertisement, I’d give it to Cambridge Analytica myself.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: The Powershell diaries: part 1
item.description: ![I spent 15 minutes trying to figure out how to get my Powershell version. Turns out the syntax is harder than quitting vim.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }
![If she’d written the Hitchhiker’s guide to the Galaxy, the Answer to the Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything would be vim.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Disagreement
item.description: ![Person 1: Truth comes from disagreement, so may I suggest..? Person 2: No. Person 1: Disagreement should be constructive. Person 2: I disagree.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Technical
item.description: ![Often, people think all of their problems are technical. Most of the time, they’re not.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Planning
item.description: ![I love planning meetings. Specially when we’re supposed to plan every single aspect of a product’s lifetime for the next 25 years]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Regex
item.description: ![I’ve heard people trying to evaluate performance by counting lines of code. That’s attributing the same value to a variable assignment and a regular expression.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Datalake
item.description: ![Everyone talks about datalakes, no one talks about quality data. So almost every datalake looks like a shitpile.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: OOM
item.description: ![The OOM killer is supposed to kill processes based on an OOM score. In reality, it just kills the Java application.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Agile says
item.description: ![It’s funny to hear people say “Agile says”. It’s like there are rules to follow.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Status feature
item.description: ![Why did they add the status feature to GitHub? What is this, Facebook?]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: ESx
item.description: ![You can get a neat mathematical formula to calculate the real name of an ECMAScript. I double dare you to try to get the same thing with Windows.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Reality
item.description: ![There’s a difference between the planning and our current progress. There must be an issue with reality. Certainly.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Retrospective
item.description: ![It’s been a while since I started posting drawings in here. It’s been fun. Maybe it’s time for a little retrospective]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: You had me at EHLO
item.description: ![Christmas is about giving. Does giving “a hard time” count? I’m thinkin about a nice Reply Allpocalypse, for instance.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Creativity
item.description: ![Developers are the most creative being in the whole universe. It would be great to have them consider operation limits within the scope of their creation though.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Random
item.description: ![I like how project managers make accurate estimations by multiplying other estimations by 2. It’s almost like multiplying two random numbers straight up.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Experience
item.description: ![Experience is a dim lamp which only lights the one who wears it. This isn’t my domain of expertise though.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Scrum Man
item.description: ![Sometimes I don’t even understand why scrum is supposed to be agile. Micro-deadlines, velocity, no backlog modification that would endanger the sprint goal? Da fuck?]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Clipboard
item.description: ![The Mac’s clipboard is shared with the iPhone’s. By default. I just sent a kubectl get pods -n dev to my Tinder match.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Stash
item.description: ![Wouldn’t it be cool if we could use git in real life?]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Typing
item.description: ![I wonder how they test static language typing. Probably stress tests?]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Monday news
item.description: ![I guess nobody ever got fired for buying RedHat]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Cyclomatic
item.description: ![Cyclomatic compelxity should not be minimized during conversations. Life would be less funnier.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Bingo
item.description: ![We try to play bullshit bingo at each conference or presentation we go. It seems slightly nihilistic, in retrospective.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Kernel
item.description: ![I really like Linus. I just hope he gets his shit together soon, otherwise it’s gonna make the community poisonous.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Synced
item.description: ![I’m having a hard time trusting Chrome nowadays. Specially since all these offers started popping in my email.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Master Branch
item.description: ![It’s good that people are starting to notice concepts that should be reconstructed in our line of work. There is still a long road ahead though. With master-slave on the works, people are forgetting some other things. Like the master branch, for example.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Futility
item.description: ![I always wondered about the actual definition of an exercice in futility. I looked it up, and a lot of things came into my mind. Like front-end tests, for example]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Distributed monolith
item.description: ![Check Conway’s Law before speedboating into microservices please]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Generics
item.description: ![Everyone is talking about the necessity of generics in go 2. I wonder if they actually know what generics are used for.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Dashboards
item.description: ![Dashboard metrics are the funniest thing. Most of the time they look like fillers though.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Math
item.description: ![A teacher once told me that if I’m having a hard time understanding a subject it’s because I don’t know enough math. It is not true.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: INVEST
item.description: ![I really like INVEST user stories, but some people insist on keeping them rather VAGUE]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Burritos
item.description: ![I always hear the same explanation from people trying to explain monads. It makes you wonder if they actually understand what it means.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Spacious separations
item.description: ![I heavily dislike ss output format. I guess ss stands for Spacious separations.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Dear Terraform
item.description: ![I believe one of the worst moments when doing infrastructure as code is when your Terraform apply crashes and then your tfstate file is all fucked up.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: We DevSecOps now
item.description: ![Now that I have a DevSecOps team I only need another DevOps team to complete my organisation entity chain]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Features
item.description: ![Programming languages are not chosen based on their features, but rather on their popularity.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Summer thoughts
item.description: ![I aways have multiple threads in my head, thinking about the most random stuff on every single situation.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Trust
item.description: ![If you put some images in prodution, it’s a good idea to go and see what the image actually does.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Acquisition
item.description: ![If you’re excited about Microsoft’s acquisition of GitHub, wait until you start seeing Mr. Clippy giving you advice in order to create merge requests.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: GDPR
item.description: ![If you wanna stress an OPS person, ask him how he is going to handle GDPR.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Deadlock
item.description: ![I happen to think that the hardest moment of the day is deciding what to get for lunch.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Stereotypes
item.description: ![A lot of persons told me that I should make Deb wear a dress and a ribbon. I’m not doing it.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Sidecar
item.description: ![I’ll probably end up getting a sidecar for human interations one of these days. Like a human service mesh.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: The show must go on
item.description: ![People will do the dumbest things in order to convince their clients that everything is going alright.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Visage pamphlet
item.description: ![Isn’t it weird to being asked to delete your data, then not doing it afterwards? It is a technique known as the “Oxford Investigativa”.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Dear Jenkins
item.description: ![I say that I hate Jenkins, often. It’s not true though.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Choices
item.description: ![It seems crazy to look like a moron if you’re not doing either golang or rust in 2018.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Go nuts
item.description: ![Fun fact: The #go channel on Freenode is about the board game, not about the programming language.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Jokes
item.description: ![I like explaining my jokes to people. It’s funnier, somehow. They tend to get frustrated. I can’t really figure out why yet.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Microservices
item.description: ![What is the actual size of a microservice? When does it become a miliservice?]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Yoloprotect
item.description: ![It’s funny that bpfilter came out when we haven’t even started using nftables, right?]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Velocity
item.description: ![I wonder if managers are going to understand eventually that velocity is not a KPI that should be use to assess teams]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: YAML
item.description: ![What’s with this new YAML sucks trend? Have you ever tried to read a JSON object? What about (not) goot old XML?]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Service Mesh
item.description: ![I wonder if Service Mesh is the new Serverless, or the new Blockchain.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Serverless
item.description: ![How come people keep talking about serverless, when everything underneath it is actually servers?]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Communication
item.description: ![DevOps requires communication between development and operations, and it’s better if they don’t want to each each other.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Estimations
item.description: ![There are many valid, snarky responses you can use when someone asks you to estimate a user story.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Healthchecks
item.description: ![If applications were sentient beings, we would annoy the fuck out of them.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Meltburn and priorities
item.description: ![I haven’t applied any security patches since 1993, but at least my employees can’t open YouTube, right?]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Twelve factor
item.description: ![I need a twelve-factor app, not a twelve factor auth, please.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Haskell goals
item.description: ![I learnt Haskell. I can fullfill my dreams now. Hi I do Javascr… HAH! PEASANT!]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Containerize everything
item.description: ![Let’s put a .doc on a container. Is it a good idea? We’ll also need Libreoffice in order to read it.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: Beer
item.description: ![Do you wanna go get a beer? I’d rather suffer excruciating pain before doing so.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: We DevOps now
item.description: ![I’ll create a new DevOps team between Dev and Ops in order to increase inter-communication.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: High performance computing
item.description: ![(Computer burns) Are you compiling the linux kernel? Nah, just running intellij.]({{ .Params.image }}){: class=“bigger-image” }

item.title: The endless struggle
item.description: ![Vim is better than emacs.]({{ .Params.image }})

item.title: Good ideas
item.description: ![Maybe we should delete /var. Ok.]({{ .Params.image }})
